about_the_game:
This game is a romance visual novel set in China's Warring States period, featuring a female protagonist's perspective.

You can unlock different storylines, explore the Warring States period of ancient China, and experience multiple endings and narratives through dialogues and interactions with characters, map exploration, tool collection, and text-based choices.

The heroine travels back to the Spring and Autumn period and the Warring States era with "Chronicles of the Eastern Zhou Kingdoms", thinking she could use her foreknowledge to give a major spoiler to King Ying Zheng of Qin and become "as wealthy as a nation, foreseeing three days in advance". Unexpectedly, she lands directly in a desolate mountain wilderness and is pursued by wild animals, fearing for her life! After narrowly escaping the beasts, she encounters a handsome man, but a series of thrilling events unfold.

Experience time-travel adventures with historical novels, indulging in the thrill of being omniscient!

Why do heroines in time-travel stories always have a hazy memory of history? Why must they drift aimlessly in the long river of time?

Ying Zheng

"If there's anything, tell me directly. I always have more solutions than you."

A male character that can be pursued. The founder of the Qin Dynasty, the first emperor in Chinese history.

Chronicles of the Eastern Zhou Kingdoms

"I'm always here, ready to accompany you at any moment."

A male character that can be pursued. Attached as a wisp of book soul in "Chronicles of the Eastern Zhou Kingdoms", he is witty and warm, always ready to devise strategies for the female protagonist. As the story unfolds, his other identity is gradually revealed...

Bai Qi

"Ending war through war, yet war arises again. How can we stop the sorrow?"

A male character that can be pursued. A renowned general during China's Warring States period. As the first person the heroine encounters in the Warring States period, he serves as both a teacher and a father figure. But why does he appear in this era?

Zhao Dan

"Thank you for not dodging this time."

A male character that can be pursued. He is a monarch of the State of Zhao during the Warring States period in China.

Son of the Crimson Emperor

"The strange recreational activity of emperors on earth: hunting for supremacy."

A male character that can be pursued. A peculiar creature with a crimson python tail, he is uninhibited and unpredictable, sometimes appearing as a giant snake, other times transforming into a dragon, bringing a different sensation with each appearance.

There are still many things you can do in the game.

You can meet many interesting people -

You can explore, travel, and roam through the vast landscapes -

As a rich tapestry slowly unfolds, welcome to the Warring States period!

  • Over 500,000 words of script text

  • Over 100 characters appearing

  • 21 distinct outcomes

  • Over 60 exquisite wallpapers

  • 5 sorrowfully beautiful theme songs and over 100 pieces of exquisite background music

  • The single route gameplay lasts for over 15 hours, while the entire gameplay exceeds 20 hours

  • This game is a fantasy story that strives for balance among gameplay, storytelling, and historical context. All characters and backgrounds do not represent real historical figures or events.

  • During the Warring States period, a hundred schools of thought contended, and the viewpoints from ancient books cited in the game do not represent the views of the creators.

  • The illustrations of the male protagonist in this game, which can be interacted with, are hand-drawn. Some of the artwork and music materials in the game are generated with the assistance of AI design.

(If you are concerned about the above information, please purchase this game with caution)

Wish all players a pleasant gaming experience~

Game Discussion Group: QQ Group 203041681, welcome to report bugs and discuss the plot.

content_descriptors.notes:
本作包含的内容可能不适合所有年龄段，或不宜在工作期间访问。
游戏中存在部分血腥、恐怖、裸露或色情内容。本作包含的内容包含描绘犯罪、饮酒内容。

name: 幻想 · 遇见秦始皇 Fantasy Encountering Emperor Qin Shi Huang

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Windows 10
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Windows 11
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio

short_description: This work is a visual novel romance set in China's Warring States period, allowing players to explore this ancient era through dialogues and interactions with characters, map exploration, tool collection, and text-based choices, and experience multiple endings and storylines.
